Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "fix for issue1281, ignore missing calcChain part" (#1288) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This is the simple approach of ignoring the missing part but leaving the relationship entry alone. Excel will handle this but if we feel it's better to remove the relationship, I can rework the fix.

Opened issue "How to open SpreadsheetDocument without calcchain.xml" (#1281) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
### Discussed in https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/discussions/1279
Originally posted by **Distancehe** December 22, 2022 The Excel file itself do not contain calcchain.xml, but calcchain.xml is referenced from workbook.xml.rels as below snapshot. When trying to load the excel with SpreadsheetDocument.Open(), it will throw exception since the calcchain.xml is missing. The question is, how to open the excel file with calcchain.xml missing? Is there some way to ignore this and continue open the file ? Thanks ! ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4394577/209112903-02252d47-95a6-4be0-a404-b3ff1ca45c63.png)
